com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.adapters

类 LayoutItemsAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.adapters.ItemsAdapter<T>
        • com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.adapters.LayoutItemsAdapter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class LayoutItemsAdapter<T>
extends ItemsAdapter<T>
    ItemsAdapter implementation that allows to populate any ViewGroup with views created by adapter, see addItemsTo(android.view.ViewGroup)
    Also you can make use of views recycling, see setUseRecycler(boolean)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int TAG_TYPE_ID 

      • 从接口继承的字段 android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      LayoutItemsAdapter(android.content.Context context)

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void addItemsTo(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
      Removes all child views from given layout group and fill it with items populated with usual adapter's lifecycle
      void attachLayout(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
      Attaches given layout group to adapter to be populated with notifyDataSetChanged().
      void notifyDataSetChanged() 
      protected void onRecycleView(android.view.View view)
      Called when view is recycled.
      protected android.view.View pollRecycledView(int itemType) 
      protected void recycleAllFrom(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
      Removing and recycling all child views from given layout group
      void setUseRecycler(boolean use)
      Sets whether to use views recycling or not.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setUseRecycler

        public void setUseRecycler(boolean use)
        Sets whether to use views recycling or not. Defaults to not use recycler.

      • attachLayout

        public void attachLayout(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
        Attaches given layout group to adapter to be populated with notifyDataSetChanged().
        If other layout group was already attached it will be cleared at first.

      • notifyDataSetChanged

        public void notifyDataSetChanged()
        覆盖:
        notifyDataSetChanged 在类中 android.widget.BaseAdapter

      • addItemsTo

        protected void addItemsTo(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
        Removes all child views from given layout group and fill it with items populated with usual adapter's lifecycle

      • recycleAllFrom

        protected void recycleAllFrom(android.view.ViewGroup layout)
        Removing and recycling all child views from given layout group

      • pollRecycledView

        protected android.view.View pollRecycledView(int itemType)

      • onRecycleView

        protected void onRecycleView(android.view.View view)
        Called when view is recycled. You can perform view clean up here (i.e. clear all images).
